name: PopUpView_New
summary: PopUpView New is a library that will provide a popup animation.
description:
PopUpView New is a very useful cocoa control for animating and show a pop view,
  PopUpView New is a library that will provide a popup animation to a UIViewControl that you add it on top of any controller.
